roleset.name: to spread or diffuse
roleset.note: PERVADE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pervade' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pervade.01-v predicate notes)
PERVASIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from pervasive.01-j)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But `` an eerie silence pervaded '' the junk market Friday as prices tumbled on hundreds of high-yield bonds despite `` no active trading , '' says [*T*-1] John Lonski , an economist at Moody 's Investors Service Inc .
example.arg: as prices tumbled on hundreds of high-yield bonds despite `` no active trading
